type.description: The type of sparklines to create, in this case it would be `column`.

data.description: The data to render the sparklines from. By default this value will be the cell value in the grid.

width.description: The width in pixels of the sparkline, by default, this will be the width of the grid's cell.

height.description: The height in pixels of the sparkline, by default, this will be the height of the grid's cell.

padding.description: Configuration for the padding in pixels shown around the sparklines.

axis.description: The styling options for the horizontal axis line in the sparklines.

highlightStyle.description: The configuration for the highlighting used when the columns are hovered over.

fill.description: The css colour value for the fill of the columns.

stroke.description: The css colour value for the outline of the columns.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the columns.

paddingInner.description: The size of the gap between the columns as a proportion, between 0 and 1. This value is a fraction of the “step”, which is the interval between the start of a band and the start of the next band.

paddingOuter.description: The padding on the outside i.e. left and right, to leave some room for the axis. In association with `paddingInner`, this value can be between 0 and 1.

formatter.description: A callback function to return format styles of type ColumnFormat.

top.description: The number of pixels of padding at the top of the sparkline area.

right.description: The number of pixels of padding at the right of the sparkline area.

bottom.description: The number of pixels of padding at the bottom of the sparkline area.

left.description: The number of pixels of padding at the left of the sparkline area.

stroke.description: The css colour value for the outline of the horizontal axis line.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the horizontal axis line.

fill.description: The fill colour of the columns when hovered over. Use `undefined` for no highlight fill.

stroke.description: The css colour value for the outline of the columns when hovered over. Use `undefined` for no highlight stroke.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the markers when hovered over.

fill.description: The css colour value for the fill of the individual column.

stroke.description: TThe css colour value for the outline of the individual column.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual column.
